skill.name: Wind Magic
skill.description: You are the master of all winds in a dungeon completely disconnected from the sky.

description.text: You are the master of all winds in a dungeon completely disconnected from the sky.
This spell allows you to blow a gust of air to knockback nearby enemies.
You take flight to a point to escape your foes, dodging attacks in the process. Unfortunately you learned to fly at the stormtrooper acadamy.

Steals the breath of your enemies, unless of course they don't have any, in which case you just wasted time studying this spell. Either way, their lack of breath means that they are unable to cast spells as all spells require incantation.
You summon a deadly whirlwind of air to disrupt your enemies.
Walking through the air itself you move to a nearby location, damaging all enemies hit with a strong gust of air.
You become the center of a raging whirlwind, punishing all around you.
